description: Defines a Flask web route for a health check endpoint using Flask-Smorest Blueprint and MethodView

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class for the health check endpoint that responds with a simple message indicating the system is healthy.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check route, returning a JSON message indicating system health.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
